meanings.definition: A noisy, boisterous parade or demonstration.
meanings.sent1: The callithumpian filled the streets with loud music and cheering.
meanings.sent2: The annual callithumpian parade passed through the town with colorful floats and marching bands.
meanings.sent3: The callithumpian procession was so loud that even the birds flew away!
meanings.sent4: The callithumpian of sounds created a chaotic symphony in the city streets.
meanings.sent5: The callithumpian of voices and instruments echoed off the buildings, creating a festive atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The callithumpian music blared from the speakers, making it hard to concentrate.
meanings.sent2: The construction site was filled with callithumpian sounds of drilling and hammering.
meanings.sent3: The callithumpian party next door kept me up all night with their loud music.
meanings.sent4: The callithumpian clash of cymbals and drums could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent5: The callithumpian roar of the crowd at the stadium was deafening.

meanings.definition: A person who participates in a callithumpian.
meanings.sent1: As a callithumpian, he loved being part of the energetic parade.
meanings.sent2: The callithumpian danced along the streets, adding to the festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The callithumpian waved to the cheering crowd as he passed by.
meanings.sent4: She joined the callithumpian with her tambourine, adding to the joyful noise.
meanings.sent5: The callithumpian's enthusiasm was infectious, spreading joy to everyone around.
